channel.title: object-detection on Samden Lepcha
channel.description: Recent content in object-detection on Samden Lepcha

item.title: Smart City Enabler
item.description: About It is a web-app to detect potholes in images and map the co-ordinates onto Google Maps. This project involved labeling images, training and deploying a custom object detection model using Mask RCNN. Technologies used: Flask, Google JavaScript API, Python, HTML, CSS and TensorFlow.

item.title: Fatigue Detection with Deep Learning
item.description: About A web-app that detects the fatigue level of a person and provides them with suggestions based on the fatigue levels. This project involves labeling images, training and deploying an Inception V2 model with faster RCNN to crop out various facial cues and Efficient Net to classify the level of fatigue in a user. Build a novel dataset for the same. Technologies used: Flask, Python, HTML CSS and TensorFlow.
